footer.brandDescription: Your trusted online recipe and grocery marketplace — connecting UK customers to local merchants.

mosaic.title: Every Culture, One Marketplace
mosaic.subtitle: Discover ingredients from Africa, Asia, and beyond.

featured.title: Featured Categories
featured.subtitle: Explore our curated selection of services designed to bring the best of culture and convenience to you.

cat1.title: Shop it, How you say it
cat1.desc: We speak your language. Experience shopping that understands you.

cat2.title: UrbanRecipe
cat2.desc: Discover, Cook, & Share your culture with authentic ingredients.

cat3.title: Sell Local. Go Global
cat3.desc: Empowering local merchants to reach a global audience.

cat4.title: Rider: Delivering Culture
cat4.desc: Quick & Reliable Service bringing home to your doorstep.

feature1.title: Shop the Way You Speak
feature1.desc: Find ingredients using local or indigenous names whether it's kontomire, egusi, or atta flour. UrbanDrop understands your language.

feature2.title: Discover Stores That Feel Like Home
feature2.desc: Explore shops and categories curated by culture from Caribbean and South Asian to West African and Middle Eastern. Everything you miss from home, all in one app.

feature3.title: Authentic Products, Verified by Culture
feature3.desc: Every product on UrbanDrop is checked for authenticity and labeled with its true origin and traditional use, so you always know you're getting the real thing.

feature4.title: More Than Shopping, It's Connection
feature4.desc: Get inspired with ethnic recipes, cooking guides, and cultural stories that celebrate where your food comes from and how it brings people together.

appDownload.desc: Download the Urbandrop app for exclusive deals, faster checkout, and real-time order tracking.

hero.desc: Whether you have a question, feedback, or just want to say hello, we're here to listen and help you grow.

sidebar.title: Contact Information
sidebar.desc: Fill out the form and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.

success.title: Message Sent!
success.desc: Thank you for reaching out. We've received your message and will get back to you shortly.

hero.desc: Experience the vibrant flavors of Africa, Asia, and the Caribbean delivered to your doorstep.

recommendation.subtitle: Explore collections tailored to your taste

topPicks.name: Top Picks Near You

everything.title: Everything You Need
everything.subtitle: From fresh produce to pantry staples.

authentic.title: Authentic & Local
authentic.subtitle: Hard-to-find ethnic ingredients at your fingertips.

shopHome.title: Shop from Home
shopHome.subtitle: Skip the lines and shop with ease.

delivered.title: Delivered to You
delivered.subtitle: Fresh groceries brought right to your door.

whatYouCanDo.title: What You Can Do
whatYouCanDo.desc: One app for all your daily needs. Discover the possibilities with Urbandrop.

groceries.title: Buy Groceries
groceries.desc: Fresh produce and essentials delivered to your door.

errands.title: Hire Errands
errands.desc: Need a hand? We can handle your daily tasks.

ethnic.title: Ethnic Flavors
ethnic.desc: Discover authentic tastes from around the world.

benefits.subtitle: Elevating your lifestyle with every delivery.

saveTime.title: Save Time
saveTime.subtitle: Get hours back in your day.

convenience.title: Experience Convenience
convenience.subtitle: Shop from your favorite local stores.

hero.desc: At Urbandrop, we're redefining how local businesses connect with customers — through speed, simplicity, and technology.

purpose.quote: To simplify daily movement and bring convenience closer to people.
